name: Disco Inferno
description:
[Controls] [Game]
  • [Arrow keys] / [W][A][S][D] - Move
  • [Left Click] - Shoot
  • [E] - Dodge-roll
  • [Escape] - Pause
  • [Q] - Quit (Only when paused)
